name: The Last Seen
description:
The story goes for a nameless soldier who fell into an abandoned army bunker. Realizing that there was no way out, he stocked up on weapons and went deeper into the bunker to look for a way out, but they did not wait for the soldier there ...

NO FLAG, NO BACKUP, NO FAMILY BEHIND

OPEN ALPHA TEST

• Graphics: 16-bit
• Music: Rock, Metal
• Sales model: Free-to-play
• Game Type: Single player
• Engine: Unreal Engine 4.21
• Platform: Android 4.4+, IOS
• Genre: 2D top down shooter
• Release date: sometime in December
